events.message: I ordered a jacket two weeks ago and it arrived in the wrong size. I would like to request a refund because I cannot exchange it.
Customer issue categorized under refund due to request for money back after receiving incorrect size product.
Support agent assigned to the refund case to assist the customer with their request.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear that you received the wrong size jacket. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging for the refund eligibility?
My order number is 12345678, and yes, the jacket is brand new and still in its original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the refund being processed promptly.
The refund process is underway. Please allow up to 5 business days for the amount to be reflected on your statement.
We are following up to confirm if you have received the refund successfully and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund appeared in my account yesterday. Thanks again for the support!
Closing the case as the refund has been received and the customer has confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
We have sent you a short survey to help us improve our customer service, thank you for your time.
